intro_desc_text: Welcome to the future of offshore inspection using autonomous drone swarms, with the AUDIT (AUtonomous Drones for InspecTion) project led by Akkodis Research. Thanks to our expertise in aeronautical engineering, autonomous systems, and AI, we are revolutionizing offshore wind farm maintenance. Dive into an immersive 6-step mission, where onboard intelligence and advanced robotics work together for unparalleled efficiency.

titles.deplacement: 1. Movement of the vessel in the wind farm

withoutNumber.deplacement: Movement of the vessel in the wind farm
